ISSUE.TITLE: DataTables drawCallback
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50.4 This is a feature suggestion. Add to the DataTablesModel ``` /// <summary> /// Gets or sets custom render draw function name(js) /// See also https://datatables.net/reference/option/drawCallback /// </summary> public string DrawCallback { get; set; } ``` and implement it in _Table.Definition ``` @if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Model.DrawCallback)) { <text> drawCallback: function (tfoot, data, start, end, display) { return @(Model.DrawCallback)(tfoot, data, start, end, display); }, </text> } ``` so that a js function may be called on table redraw. perhaps for 4.6 - but implementation was very is easy for me to apply to 4.5.
